title: AWS re:Invent 2025 -JPMorganChase & Amazon Advanced Solutions Lab drive quantum R&D on Braket-CMP327
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 摩根大通与亚马逊高级解决方案实验室在Braket上推动量子研发-CMP327
abstract: Explore how JPMorganChase and the Amazon Advanced Solutions Lab are advancing quantum computing research on Amazon Braket. This session presents qReduMIS, a hybrid quantum-classical algorithm developed to solve maximum independent set problems. Tested on Rydberg quantum hardware with up to 231 qubits, the algorithm uses quantum systems as co-processors to identify key vertices and improve reduction efficiency. Results show how qReduMIS addresses performance gaps in both classical and quantum solvers. Learn how this approach extends across superconducting qubits, trapped ions, and other platforms, paving the way for practical, scalable quantum solutions.
abstract_cn: 探索摩根大通和亚马逊高级解决方案实验室如何在Amazon Braket上推进量子计算研究。本次会议介绍qReduMIS，这是一种混合量子-经典算法，专为解决最大独立集问题而开发。该算法在多达231个量子比特的Rydberg量子硬件上进行测试，利用量子系统作为协处理器来识别关键顶点并提高约简效率。结果显示qReduMIS如何解决经典和量子求解器的性能差距。了解这种方法如何扩展到超导量子比特、离子阱和其他平台，为实用、可扩展的量子解决方案铺平道路。
